text: Puchte hain: haiz ka kya hukm hai? Kaho: woh ek gandagi ki haalat hai, ismein auraton se alag raho aur unke kareeb na jao, jab tak ke woh paak saaf na ho jayein, phir jab woh paak ho jayein to unke paas jao us tarah jaisa ke Allah ne tumko hukum diya hai, Allah un logon ko pasand karta hai jo badhi (gunaah) se baaz rahein aur pakeezgi ikhtiyar karein
